text: Clifford Rose (24 October 1929 â€“ 6 November 2021) was a British actor. His career began in 1959 and he retired in 2019. He played George V in the television movie Wallis & Edward. He was known for playing Ludwig Kessler in the television series Secret Army. Rose appeared as Bailiff in Pirates of the Caribbean: On Stranger Tides and in an episode of Netflix's The Crown. He also played James in The Iron Lady. Rose died on 6 November 2021 in England, aged 92. ==References== Category:1929 births Category:2021 deaths Category:British stage actors Category:British movie actors Category:British television actors Category:People from Herefordshire
title: Clifford Rose
